author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MLS's 2017 Net Profit Up, Sees Q1 Profit To Rise
text:
March 4 (Reuters) - MLS Co Ltd:
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 41.2 PERCENT Y/Y AT 668.5 MILLION YUAN ($105.40 million)
* SAYS IT EXPECTS Q1 NET PROFIT TO RISE 13.15-35.78 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 132.57 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BORROW UP TO 800 MILLION YUAN FROM CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER TO REPLENISH CAPITAL
* SAYS IT PLANS FINANCIAL LEASING OF UP TO 1.0 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FoS6Ng ; bit.ly/2FUkncE ; bit.ly/2CYdYd8 ; bit.ly/2HYAEhj Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3428 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
